name: Singularity
description:
might crash after install just close steam and relaunch the game that worked 
also you need to do the following to change the resolution 
right click on the game in lutris click on wine registry then navigate to 

HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Activision\Singularity

set resx to your horizontal resolution (must be in decimal mode!)
set resy to your vertical resolution (again must be in decimal mode)
